item.description:
Kabbalah at the Shabbat Table

Welcome everyone, whether you want to reconnect with our tradition, or whether your soul is calling you to learn more about Jewish ways. This night we fully experience the beauty of Shabbat. We welcome, bless and being blessed, we dwell in the glory of the Shabbat Queen, Shechinah, the Divine Presence.

We perform all Shabbat rituals in the Orthodox tradition, dress in festive ways, light candles, sing, enjoy plentiful traditional Shabbat meals, read Torah and discuss how the Torah themes manifest in our lives on spiritual and physical levels. We learn the Kabbalistic meaning of Shabbat, her rituals and brachot (blessings).

We also experience meditative practice of blessing as a most direct way of receiving Ruach HaKodesh, Divine Inspiration: deep esoteric practice that is capable of changing one's life on all levels.

How to dress: As you feel is appropriate for being in Divine Presence.

If you observe orthodox tradition and do not drive, overnight accommodations are available. Please let
me know in advance.

If you have dietary restrictions or preferences, please let me know by the time of rsvp.

Part of your offering will go to charity. Please contribute online with paypal. If you need financial arrangements, please email me.

Looking forward to our Shabbat together!
item.name: Kabbalah at the Shabbat Table
